meanings.sent1: I summed the apples and oranges to know how many fruits I had.
meanings.sent2: She summed the scores of the game to find out who won.
meanings.sent3: The teacher summed the number of pencils in a funny dance.
meanings.sent4: His dedication to his work can be summed up in the long hours he puts in every day.
meanings.sent5: The importance of teamwork can be summed up in the phrase 'Together Everyone Achieves More.'

meanings.sent1: The cashier summed the cost of the groceries for the customer.
meanings.sent2: He summed the expenses for the month to see if he stayed within his budget.
meanings.sent3: The robot summed the number of steps it took to reach the end of the maze.
meanings.sent4: Her kindness can be summed up in the way she always helps others without expecting anything in return.
meanings.sent5: The beauty of nature can be summed up in the breathtaking view from the mountaintop.

meanings.sent1: She summed her ingredients to make a delicious cake.
meanings.sent2: The artist summed different colors to create a stunning painting.
meanings.sent3: The magician summed various tricks to put on an entertaining show.
meanings.sent4: His leadership style can be summed up in his ability to unite people towards a common goal.
meanings.sent5: The power of unity can be summed up in the strength of a bundle of sticks compared to a single stick.
